channel.title: [718] Cisindra
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to [i]Cisindra[/i],
[i][b]About:[/b][/i] [i]Cisindra[/i] is an advanced 718 [i]RuneScape Private Server[/i]. We want to offer you the best gameplay experience that's available; we do this by programming on high quality, which results in a high quality result which you can enjoy. We try to offer daily updates, to make our [i]RuneScape Private Server[/i] even more enjoyable. Our updates are community based, you decide what we create. We always have a delay between the poll and the update so we can test it to it's limit.
[i][b]Features:[/b][/i] Our current features are high quality and are programmed and tested by highly experienced staff-members. Like we stated before we want to offer the ultimate experience by giving you the perfect content. We already have a load of content added, such as; Gravestones, Clue Scrolls, Quests, Bank Pins, Ancient Effigies, EXP Lamps, Gnome Gliders, Lodestones, Fairy Rings, Ecto Funtus, Full Squeal of Fortune, Fully intergraded Money Pouch, A perfectly working Toolbelt, Full Farming,
A lot of reworked skills such as; Mining, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Runecrafting, Smithing, Thieving, Crafting, Cooking, Slayer and Hunter (of course, the other skills are working as well), Really much and enjoyable Minigames; Fight Caves, Kiln and Caves, Godwars, Crucible, Barrows, Dominion Tower, Castle Wars, Clan Wars, Pest Control and The Duel Arena (if you're missing a lovely minigame, please suggest it),
A large amount of Bosses to fight (if you dare); Nex, General Graardor (Bandos), Kree'arra (Armadyl), Commander Zilyana (Saradomin), K'ril Tsutsaroth (Zamorak), Dagannoth Kings, Glacors, Corporeal Beast, King Black Dragon, Queen Black Dragon, Tormented Demons and The Kalphite Queen,
A strong anti-cheat system which we recently intergraded to keep hackers away from our server and make your account more secure,
A powerful dedicated server, which is secured with a 600gb/s DDoS protection
[i][b]Links:[/b][/i] Homepage: http://cisindra.com Community Board / Forum: http://community.cisindra.com Vote Page: In Maintenance Highscores: In Maintenance Facebook: - Twitter: https://twitter.com/Cisindradotcom Youtube: -[/center]

[center]Welcome to Cisindra,

About:
Cisindra is an advanced 718 RuneScape Private Server.
We want to offer you the best gameplay experience that’s available; we do this by programming on high quality, which results in a high quality result which you can enjoy.
We try to offer daily updates, to make our RuneScape Private Server even more enjoyable.
Our updates are community based, you decide what we create. We always have a delay between the poll and the update so we can test it to it’s limit.

Features:

Gravestones,

Really much and enjoyable Minigames; Fight Caves, Kiln and Caves, Godwars, Crucible, Barrows, Dominion Tower, Castle Wars, Clan Wars, Pest Control and The Duel Arena (if you’re missing a lovely minigame, please suggest it),

A strong anti-cheat system which we recently intergraded to keep hackers away from our server and make your account more secure,
